document_data.name: Regweld Harpell
document_data.deathnotes: (Killed by [[drow]] in the [[Battle of Keeper's Dale]])
document_data.mainbody: '''Regweld Harpell''' was a member of the [[Harpell]] family which lived in [[Longsaddle]] in the [[Savage Frontier]].
document_data.Personality: The eccentric [[wizard]] loved crossbreeding animals and succeeded in making [[Puddlejumper]], which was a mix of [[horse]] and [[frog]].
document_data.History:
In [[1358 DR]], Regweld protected [[Mithral Hall]] with his family members: [[Bidderdoo Harpell|Bidderdoo]], [[Bella don Delroy Harpell|Bella don Delroy]], and [[Harkle Harpell]] to help defend [[Mithral Hall]].

While riding Puddlejumper in the [[Battle of Keeper's Dale]], Regweld was hit by three [[lightning bolt]]s cast by enemy [[drow]] wizards as he battled a group of [[minotaur]]s.
